author: Danielle Bacher
title: Matthew Broderick’s Sister Recounts Near-Death Coronavirus Experience
description: Reverend Janet Broderick says her religious beliefs and training helped her get through the worst.
content: Im going to die, the Reverend Janet Broderick told herself, even before receiving news that she had been diagnosed with COVID-19, the disease caused by the coronavirus. She thought quickly, praying to Jesus and planning her funeral. There was the preacher, th… [+9587 chars]
